description:
A timeless-looking style made using responsible modern-day methods, the Hillgard Jean is an easy outfitting choice for weekdays, weekends, and everywhere you want to be.

Made with our signature Traditional Stretch Denim, this style offers the best of both worlds—the classic jean texture you know and love plus just the right amount of added elasticity for much-needed comfort.
name: Prana Hillgard Jeans, 32" Inseam - Mens
